--mbx-toggle-on-icon-internal-light.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-on-icon-internal-dark.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `on`

--mbx-toggle-on-icon-external-light.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `on`

--mbx-toggle-on-icon-external-dark.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on` and toggle status is `on`

--mbx-toggle-off-icon-internal-light.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-off-icon-internal-dark.description: Toggle icon internal color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-off-icon-external-light.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `off` and toggle status is `off`

--mbx-toggle-off-icon-external-dark.description: Toggle icon external color, when [dark mode](https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/docs/shared/props/#dark) is `on` and toggle status is `off`
